website_summaries.verdict: A solid pair of hikers that you can take to the trail rain or shine - the Merrell Pulsate 2 Mid Leather Waterproof is designed to give adventurers and outdoorsy folks with all-day comfort. It gets high marks for being downright comfortable, light, and supportive. Plus, the aggressive outsole ensures that you're able to traverse rugged terrain safely and comfortably.While there is some doubt as to its waterproofing quality, this high-quality hiking footwear from Merrell is still rated highly for its top-notch features.
pros: Most of the Merrell Pulsate 2 Mid Leather Waterproof reviews say that it is amazingly comfortable right off the box
It's truly a nice lightweight hiking boot, according to most wearers
Many are impressed that it holds up well in long hikes
The Merrell Pulsate 2 Mid Leather Waterproof hiking boot has a fairly aggressive tread pattern that works in rough terrain, according to some
Several users commend this boot for delivering great arch support even for people with very high arches
It's a solid hiker, note a good number of reviewers
cons: A few wearers are disappointed with the boot's waterproofing
One says water still seeps in

customer_reviews.title: No Comment
customer_reviews.text: Just returned from a trip though Upper State NY, New Hampshire, Maine (Acadia National Park) Did a lot of hiking, shoes held up well and were comfortable from start to finish. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Fullerton

customer_reviews.title: Great on the feel a bit lackluster on the looks.
customer_reviews.text: These would probably do great on trail - but looks are nothing special. Plenty of cushion everywhere, springy - very unique feel but in a good way. Sole grips on everything. I wear a Medium but opted for a Wide because of many other reviews stating that Merrell’s run narrow and wide has great amt of room but then the whole thing just feels bulky (clumsy). Lacing system does NOT poke anywhere, nor does the design (yeah I am talking to you Danner and Under Armour and North Face). My takeaway - it won’t win any awards in the looks dept, maybe once covered in mud, but form and function is definitely there - but a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Just as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other "W" (wide) Merrell products this one is correct. No pinching of the toes on long hikes. The configuration of the laces allows for a snug but not tight fit around the ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hacker

customer_reviews.title: great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Overall, great stability, easy flowing shoe, nice to walk in. No more slipping with tennis shoes. not good. especially with photo equipment on board. Great shoe for rocks, rivers, and overall walking and hiking. Put good liner inside, I use one in all my shoes that I get from amazon, great fit. Easy shoe to put on. I would recommend this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: richard graziani

customer_reviews.title: Generally good quality products
customer_reviews.text: Good product in general I've been wearing merrell products for several years. That being said this pair I've noticed the stitching coming apart on both sides they are very lightly used at this point also do to me already having several pairs. I hope this isn't a sign of things coming
customer_reviews.author: T.J. B.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOE!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes...feel sooooh good! My 4th pair of Merrell's, and I’m got another pair of these in the brown! Too expensive though, but, worth it!
customer_reviews.author: daddio1947

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: It fits me great. Very comfortable and light weight. The suede and sole appear to be waterproof as advertised, but I'm not expecting that the mesh tongue will be. So keep in mind you'll only be able to submerge the boot below the mesh line. I will primarily be using these for ruck hiking trails and minor off-road terrain. I was able to get these boots when Amazon had them on sale for $75.
customer_reviews.author: David DeHondt

customer_reviews.title: Great boot!
customer_reviews.text: For a lightweight boot, it has a fairly aggressive tread pattern, which I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN R BELL

customer_reviews.title: Great Hiking Boot
customer_reviews.text: A little heavier duty than my previous hiking shoes but that;s good as my terrain is very rocky. The high tops are good to stabilize the ankles. Construction is Merrell standards.
customer_reviews.author: George P. Cornell

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Order these and the Merrell Men's Chameleon 7 Mid LTR Waterproof Hiking Shoes after not finding them in my hubby's size in the stores. He had a low top pair of Pulsate in the past that he really liked and have worn out. He liked both styles, especially preferred the color of the Chameleon, but in the end, the Pulsate 2 Mid were much more comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: I have an EE foot width and these are very comfortable. Plenty wide for my tastes.
customer_reviews.text: I have only worn them to walk the dog so far. I'll soon get a chance to see how they perform in snow, slush, and ice. Quality seems first rate, attention to detail is good. They will probably get better with some wear as the insole forms to my foot This is my second pair of Merrell shoes. I would buy both pair again.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R. Hood

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for MOAB 2
customer_reviews.text: Loved the Merrell MOAB 2 MID boots so I tried these when it came time to replace them. These are a great fit and even more comfortable. Used on moderate Michigan hiking trails and dog walks in town or parks. Have not had them long enough for use in extreme temperatures (hot or cold).
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: King of hikers
customer_reviews.text: Merrell holds up better and is more comfortable then almost any shoe I’ve owned.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot
customer_reviews.text: Great boot, somewhat stylish, stays fairly dry ( with waterproofing) and currently at good price
customer_reviews.author: Michael Y.

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I love the grip and how they fit! Definitely worth the price and would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I just started wearing so far so good very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Boswell

customer_reviews.title: love Merrell
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other brands, but keep coming back to Merrell. They are comfortable right out of the box, and even fit my mutant wide feet. They are light and seem to be reasonably waterproof. I will get to try them in snow this week.
customer_reviews.author: John Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: This is my husband's second pair of these boots. They last for years.
customer_reviews.author: ElaineReads

customer_reviews.title: Just saying - these are awesome.
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best hiker Merrell has ever manufactured.

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are comfortable but arfter three months they are not waterproof as advertised.

product_meta.title: Merrell Mens Pulsate 2 Mid LTR Waterproof
product_meta.description: Feel supported and protected all day long with cushioned comfort and reliable stability of the Merrell® Pulsate 2 Mid Leather Waterproof hiker shoe. Full grain leather and mesh upper. M Select™ DRY impermeable membrane seals out water while allowing moisture to escape. Mid-profile hiker boot for added ankle protection. Interior is treated with M Select™ FRESH antimicrobial agents that help reduce shoe odor. Bellows tongue helps keep debris out. Plush tongue and collar. Protective rubber toe cap guards against rocks and trail debris. Traditional lace-up system for a secure fit. Heel pull tab. Breathable mesh lining. Removable Kinetic Fit™ BASE contoured insole provides flexible support and underfoot comfort. Compression-molded EVA midsole for stability and comfort. Merrell air cushion in the heel absorbs impacting shock. Molded nylon arch shank. M Select™ GRIP outsole provides durable traction on a variety of surfaces. 5mm lug depth. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 1 lb 6 oz Shaft: 5 1⁄4 in Product measurements were taken using size 12, width M. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Merrell Kinetic Fit BASE removable contoured footbed for flexible support
M Select GRIP tunes each outsole with durable traction that grips when and where you need it
